start_sources()
# -- editorenvironment.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"

		"main.cpp"

		"EditorEnvironmentWindow.h"

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEditorPlugin(EditorEnvironment PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../../EditorQt)	
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../../EditorQt/Include)
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE Sandbox)
